text: [Music]
Stanford lies at the heart of Silicon
Valley and uh when you think of Silicon
Valley and by implication Stanford uh
you think of the people who take risks
break boundaries uh that's the reason
why I think Stanford indeed is a unique
place to understand Innovation and
Entrepreneurship we have Cherry Picked
to be honest the best Stanford faculty
we can find and Entrepreneurship and
Innovation on one hand you'll have
people who will do more rigorous
research like my colleague Huggy r on
the other hand you'll have folks like
Perry Claybon who actually invented the
modern Snowshoe so we have that sort of
range of folks to bring together if you
will the rigorous and the relevant or
what the certificate program and the
courses in the certificate program do is
they inform people about Cutting Edge
practices they illuminate principles
underlying Innovation and
Entrepreneurship but most of all they
inspire people so that you can go out
and innovate and be an entrepreneur in
your own company or in your own corner
of the world taught by world renown
faculty from The Graduate School of
Business and the School of Engineering
the Stanford Innovation and
Entrepreneurship certificate is a
self-paced interactive online program
where you will gain essential skills and
effective strategies to generate and
implement new ideas each course is
divided into modules and contains
lectures interactive assignments and
readings throughout the course the
Stanford teaching team will provide you
with feedback on select assignments
challenging you to apply your knowledge
and hone your Innovation skills through
the Forum you can deepen The Learning
Experience by discussing course topics
and interacting with your peers and the
Stanford teaching team upon the
successful completion of eight courses
you will receive your Stanford
certificate the question of how you lead
Innovative work or contribute to it is
something that I just see as generic
problems in all organizations that try
to be effective our hope is it's only to
start of a journey that individuals
embark on uh a journey where they go
create companies uh create products
create Services reshape the big
Enterprises that they work in
[Music]
